data.name: The Eccentric Family: Daimonji Luxury Liner Battle Continued
data.short_description: Yasaburo manages to get Yaichiro and Gyokuran together, but then a new problem arises. They had still not procured a ship to fly the skies during the Gozan Farewell Bonfire. Yasaburo tells everyone to let him handle it, and heads over to Akadama-sensei’s apartment.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
